Utterance: Welcome back! How did your week go? Were you able to work on your list of interests?
Hi! Yes, I did. I wrote down a few things I’m interested in, but I still feel a bit lost about them.
That’s a great start! What did you write down?
I wrote down cooking, astronomy, and maybe starting a blog about travel.
Those are fantastic interests! Cooking can be a great creative outlet, and combining it with travel sounds exciting. What about cooking appeals to you?
I love experimenting with new recipes and flavors. It’s relaxing for me.
That’s wonderful! Cooking can also be a way to connect with others. Have you thought about sharing your cooking with friends or family?
I have! I’ve thought about hosting a small dinner party.
That sounds like a great idea! It could be a fun way to combine your interest in cooking and spending time with friends. How does that make you feel?
Excited, but also a little nervous. What if they don’t like my food?
It’s normal to feel nervous, but remember that it’s about the experience and connection, not just the food. Your friends will appreciate the effort you put into it.
That’s true. I’ll try to keep that in mind.
Good! How about your conversations with friends regarding your feelings? Were you able to open up to anyone?
Yes, I talked to one of my close friends about how I’ve been feeling since the breakup. It felt good to share.
That’s fantastic! How did your friend respond?
They were really supportive and said they’re there for me. It helped a lot.
That’s so important to have that support. It can make a big difference in how we process our feelings. Have you noticed any changes in your mood since you’ve been more open?
Yeah, I think I feel less heavy. It’s nice to talk about it instead of keeping it all inside.
That’s a significant realization! It’s often easier to carry our burdens when we share them. How about your goals for the upcoming week?
I want to plan that dinner party and maybe try a new recipe.
That sounds like a fun project! Do you have a specific recipe in mind?
I was thinking of making homemade pasta. I’ve never tried it before!
That’s ambitious! It could be a great learning experience. I’d love to hear how it goes. Remember to enjoy the process, even if it doesn’t turn out perfectly.
Thanks, I’ll keep that in mind.
Before we wrap up, is there anything else you’d like to discuss today?
I guess I just want to keep working on not feeling like I’m settling for less. I want to feel more driven.
That’s a great insight. Perhaps we can explore what drives you and what might ignite that passion in you. Would you like to dive into that next session?
Yes, I’d like that.
Perfect! I’m looking forward to it. Have a wonderful week, and enjoy your cooking!
Thank you! See you next time.
